title: I only had Pixel 5 issues with certain appsThey either font work or play up especially WhatsApp
content:
Issues with certain apps, especially the send button on WhatsApp 
Some apps refuse to work and the developers don't have a clue 
Also about the battery it's took it off charge at 8am it's now 5pm using it mildly as normal no gaming it video it's only got 33% left
